title: A Wonderful Trip to Paris
description: An exciting 2-day itinerary exploring the best of Paris, from iconic landmarks to charming neighborhoods.

days.notes: First day in Paris! Focus on seeing the main sights and enjoying the local food.

places.name: Arrive at Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG)
Check-in at Hotel Le Meurice
places.description: Drop off luggage and freshen up before heading out.

places.name: Lunch at Le Bouillon Chartier
places.description: Experience a classic Parisian bouillon with traditional French dishes.
places.address: 7 Rue du Faubourg Montmartre, 75009 Paris, France

places.name: Visit the Eiffel Tower
places.description: Tickets are pre-booked for the summit. Be there 15 minutes early.
places.address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

places.name: Dinner Cruise on the Seine
places.description: Enjoy a scenic dinner with Bateaux Parisiens.
places.address: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

days.notes: Day of art and exploration. Wear comfortable shoes for walking in Montmartre.

places.name: Explore the Louvre Museum
places.description: Focus on the Denon wing to see the Mona Lisa and other masterpieces.

places.name: Lunch near the Louvre
places.description: Find a local cafe for a quick bite.

places.name: Walk through Montmartre and visit Sacré-Cœur
places.description: Explore the artistic neighborhood and enjoy the panoramic views from the basilica.
places.address: 35 Rue du Chevalier de la Barre, 75018 Paris, France
